summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department and the Department of Community Development; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Engineering Operating Fund in aid of the improvement of THE ALLEY IN BLOCK 7, PLAT OF LIBERTY DIVISION NO. 1, et al, by paving and otherwise improving the same under Local Improvement District No. 6719, as created by Ordinance 108785; authorizing the hiring of expert and consultant services therefor; and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1980 Budget of the Engineering Department.
